features: 【11 inch Granite Non Stick Coating Frying Pan Skillet】What Is A Good nonstick Pan? Non-stick performance is the key. Compared to other ordinary non-stick pans, VERMONGA's nonstick set adds 4 layers of non-stick coating, which means that the frying pans can better demonstrate long-lasting non-stick. Less oil or butter for cooking will release the food easily. Ideal for every cooking master.

【4 Layers of Non-stick Coating & Heats Quickly & Evenly】VERMONGA's nonstick set adds 4 layers of non-stick Granite coating, which can Heats Quickly and Evenly with precise temperature control and not hot spot. The Granite frying pan is designed for professional multiple cooking use, pans for cooking, egg pan, cooking pan, omelet pan, sauté pan, egg skillet, induction pan.

【Safety Healthy Cooking】This non-stick pan is pans for cooking with less oil needed and less smoke released. This nonstick frying pan is ideal for healthy cooking, less oil use for healthy diet. Choose Easy chef always Frying Pan for greener and healthier cooking. Our Vermonga Chef Pan is 100% Free of PFOS, PFOA, PFAS.

【Easy To Clean】With the non-stick Granite coating, there are no more sticky or difficult-to-clean problems. Only by using a soft sponge or dishcloth, you can clear oil stains easily. Please do not use a sharp or pointy brush, which would do harm to the non-stick layer. Besides its wonderful nonstick and quick clean performance, this nonstick cooking pan is dishwasher safe.

【100% Satisfactory Guarantee】Vermonga is happy to listen to what our customers really think, and our policy is to make our customers 100% satisfied with our goods and services. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Buy Vermonga Nonstick Frying Pan Skillet This granite coating is imported from Switzerland, which is extremely non-stick, so you can make a meal full of flavor. The most important is that it is super easy to clean. You don't need a dishwasher, just wipe it with a paper towel or rinse it with water, which make cooking not only easier but also more enjoyable. Our nonstick skillet coated granite coating is PFOA FREE, durable & scratch-resistant. And the pans for cooking would need less oil so you can make a healthier diet with these premium nonstick frying pans. Our granite nonstick pan provide the perfect size for most everyday use. Perfect for cooking/reheating vegetables, egg, veggies, meats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this pan! Highly recommended!
reviews.reviewText: I did not expect too much with this pan, but after reading reviews on it I thought I'd give it a try. This is my go to pan now. I have used it for so many things since I purchased it. It heats very evenly. It is truly a non-stick pan.Washes up great. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works better than some of the more expensive non stick pans. Handle is coming loose, a little annoying but still I can tighten the handle. You get what you pay for. The pan works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect frying pan.
reviews.reviewText: Nothing sticks but cooks well and browns perfectly. Nice weight, handle easily attaches. Perfect size- not too big or small. Perfect Inbetween cool ware! Actually got a second pan after trying the first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars how to you attach this handle
reviews.reviewText: After receiving a replacement pan (customer service at Vermonga was excellent) I still struggled with the handle. I received help from a friend and it still took him over 10 minutes to attached. After all that I have to say I love this frying pay. Nice quality sturdy without being to heavy to lift. Easy clean up after cooking eggs and fried potatoes. Hang in there if you are having a problem with the handle. It will be worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coating surface, could be flatter
reviews.reviewText: Having used this for a few months, the coating still looks brand new. This should last longer than just non-stick teflon coatings since it's supposed to be "stone," so we'll see. It is very non-stick, eggs slide around no problem. The bottom is still not perfectly flat, eggs tend to slide to the outside edge away from the middle, but most pans have this problem. If anything my biggest complaint is it's smaller than my last good pan, so I'm having to get used to a smaller cooking surface, and that's my bad for not getting a bigger one! I'm definitely considering it if the price is right, I recommend this pan so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great frying pan.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean, price was right and very pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Screwing in handle took way too long.
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice pan. Non stick works well. Only issue was with the tiny screw you had to use to put the handle on. It did not fit correct. It took 3 people to hold it down, screw it in and it still wobbles a little as it can get no tighter then it already is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
